message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I can offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I value this product and truly look forward to purchasing it from you. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9000. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest. How about we settle at $10500 for the product? Looking forward to your thoughts!
